content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam Abbasi, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see you are a student. I can offer you the apartment for 650 Euro.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too low for me. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
